channel.title: 508 Compiler Code?
channel.description:
When i use my compiler code it says "system cannot find the path specified"
my compiler code is as follows.
[code]@echo off Title Berky-Scape Compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause[/code]

item.title: 508 Compiler Code?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

  1. Wrong java version stated
  2. Set your environment variables

One of those are the problem :rolleyes:

Thanks,
Denoria.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Compiler Code?
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

Make sure u have jdk1.6.0_13

is that your installed java version? if not, u need to change it to a previous version or jre or something.

and if ur not useing bulby then it wont work neways…but if u are, its probably your java version

Read full topic
